channel.description: RSS wrapper of Hayday inbox News

item.title: Learn how to create a Farm Patch!
Vote for your favorite Farm Patches NOW!
item.description:
It's time to vote for your favorite designs on Supercell Make! You can vote even if you didn't submit a design.

Click the below button:

item.title: Holly Milestone Info
item.description:
We are giving away super boosters, expansion permits, surprise boxes and the Santa Cow!

We have prepared a new community milestone to celebrate the Winter Holidays! Your mission? Fill up the tracking bar by producing gifts with the new Gift Wrapping Station delivered by Alfred, then shipping them off in boat orders to earn the new currency: Holly.

The goal for all of you is to collect as many Hollies as possible together as a community.

These are the milestones:

  • 1 billion Hollies - 2x Boat Boosters

  • 2 billion Hollies - Santa Cow

  • 3 billion Hollies - 2x Dairy Super Boosters

  • 4 billion Hollies - 4x Expansion Permits

For every milestone reached, we will activate a bonus free surprise box in the shop for everyone!

And donâ€™t worry if youâ€™re below level 35! Instead of boosters, youâ€™ll receive 10,000 coins for every milestone that includes boosters.

When it's time to collect your rewards, head over to the shop. You'll find them waiting as free items, just a scroll past the Farm Pass offers.

The community event will last for eight days, and it starts now!

item.title: Hay Day Week 51
item.description:
Hay Day Week 51

Hey farmers! Get ready for another week of events! All events & derbies start at 8 AM UTC. Jump into the specifics of each event by visiting our event board in the game.

Monday: Spin the Wheel (Puzzle Pieces)

Tuesday: Truck Event (Expansion Materials)

Wednesday: Animal Feed Event (3 random types of animal feed produced 2x faster)

Thursday: Farm Visitor Event (Yard Sale)

Friday: Fishing Production Boost Event (All 20% Boost) + 2x Farm Pass Points

Saturday: Town Visitor Event (x2 Coins)Â 

Sunday: Trees/Bushes Time Percent (3 random types of bushes or trees will produce fruits at 2x speed) Derby: Normal

Have a great week!

item.title: Hay Day Week 52
item.description:
Hay Day Week 52

Howdy farmers! Get ready for another week of events! All events & derbies start at 8 AM UTC. Jump into the specifics of each event by visiting our event board in the game.

Monday: Spin the Wheel (Vouchers)

Tuesday: Truck Event (x2 XP)

Wednesday: Crops Event (three random crops will yield 3 crops instead of the usual 2)

Thursday: Production Buildings (20% boost for 3 buildings)

Friday: Fishing Event (Duck + Net Maker 30%) + 2x Farm Pass Points

Saturday: Town Visitors Event (Expansion Materials)

Sunday: Crops Event (three random crops will yield 3 crops instead of the usual 2)Â + 3x Farm Pass Points

Derby: Bingo

Have an amazing week!

Hay Day Week 1

Hi farmers! Get ready for another week of events! All events & derbies start at 8 AM UTC. Jump into the specifics of each event by visiting our event board in the game.

Monday: Spin the Wheel (Expansion Materials) + 3x Farm Pass Points

Tuesday: Animal Feed Event (3 random types of animal feed produced 2x faster) + 3x Farm Pass Points

Wednesday: Boat Event (Boosters) + 3x Farm Pass Points

Thursday: Farm Visitor Event (x2 Coins) + 3x Farm Pass Points

Friday: Fishing Event (Lobsters + Lures 30%) + 3x Farm Pass Points

Saturday: Town Visitor Event (Silo & Barn Materials)

Sunday: Animal Feed Event (3 random types of animal feed produced 2x faster)

Derby: Power

Have a fantastic week!

item.title: Important Announcement: Amazon Mobile App Store Shutdown
item.description:
Attention, Farmers!Â 

Amazon recently announced that they will be shutting down their store for mobile devices this August. If you downloaded or are currently playing Hay Day through the Amazon Mobile Store, this change is going to directly affect you, as you will eventually lose access to your account on that device.

But donâ€™t worry - weâ€™re here to help you secure your progress and keep farming!

What You Need to Know:Â 

  • If you downloaded or currently play Hay Day through the Amazon Mobile App Store, this change directly affects you.

  • Once the store shuts down, youâ€™ll no longer be able to access your account through the Amazon Mobile App Store.

What you can do now:

Switch to a tablet - The Amazon Store will still be available on tablets, so you can continue playing there.

Create a Supercell ID - This is the only way to keep your account and progress safe! Your Supercell ID allows you to log in on another device using the same email address linked to your account.

How to create a Supercell ID:

To create a Supercell ID, follow these instructions: https://support.supercell.com/hay-day/en/articles/saving-your-account-to-supercell-id.html

We recommend making these changes as soon as possible to avoid losing your progress! If you have any questions, donâ€™t hesitate to reach out to our support team!
